transportAdvice: Bucharest has a well-developed public transit network including a metro, buses, and trams that connect most tourist areas efficiently. Taxis are widely available and affordable, and the historic central districts are compact enough for comfortable walking.

weather.description: Cold and grey with occasional snow and freezing temperatures, typical of a continental winter.
Still cold with possible snow and frost, though days gradually begin to lengthen.
Early spring brings mild days but unpredictable weather with rain and lingering cold snaps.
Pleasant spring weather with blooming parks, though showers are common throughout the month.
Warm and green with occasional thunderstorms, one of the most enjoyable months to visit.
Warm to hot with longer days and periodic afternoon thunderstorms typical of early summer.
Hot and mostly sunny, the driest month of the year and peak summer conditions.
Continues hot and dry with intense afternoon heat, similar to July.
Comfortable early autumn temperatures with decreasing rainfall and pleasant evenings.
Mild and colourful with autumn foliage, though rain becomes more frequent toward month's end.
Cool and often overcast with increasing rain and the first hints of winter chill.
Cold winter month with possible snow and festive Christmas markets in the city centre.
